summary: The BuildRequest contains no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces substantial backend and frontend functionality (e.g., access control, user profiles, push subscriptions, radio stream checking, UI/playback changes, and PWA/service worker related updates) that were not explicitly requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/initialized an authorization/access-control system and permission checks (e.g., #user, admin checks) across canister methods.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; access control was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented a user profile system (UserProfile type, save/get profile APIs).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; user profiles were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented push notification subscription storage and related APIs (PushSubscription, store/get subscription).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; push subscription management was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented radio stream availability checking via HTTP outcalls and exposed stream URL/interval getters.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; radio availability checks/outcalls were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented request saving and retrieval (saveRequest/getRequests) with timestamps.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; request storage functionality was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified HomeLiveScreen UI/behavior for live playback (play/pause button, connecting/buffering states, live indicator, favorite toggling, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest; UI changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking metadata (project_state.json) indicating pending feature requests about background image and restoring play button.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest itself lists no requirements; these appear as added internal tracking rather than requested implementation.
